subject: Threaded test cases
msgSnippet: In order to test certain aspects of my code, I essentially need to run several threads, and have those threads assert serveral things.  Does JUnit have direct
messageBody:
In order to test certain aspects of my code, I essentially need to run
several threads, and have those threads assert serveral things. Does
JUnit have direct support for such? If not, any suggestions on how to
solve this?
--
David Corbin
Mach Turtle Technologies, Inc.
http://www.machturtle.com
dcorbin@...
